name: Kamikaze (Griffin G. Salazar)
description:
Kamikaze is a game where you play as a tank trying to destroy as many falling planes as possible before they destroy the buildings and people around you (and you!)

The game is quite simple: just select a difficulty, use a/the left arrow and d/the right arrow to move, click to shoot, and see how high of a score you can get! The more difficult a plane is to shoot down, the more points it is worth!
